subject: Snowboarding
X Games
lead_paragraph: U.S. Snowboarding made a deal to hold an exclusive two-week camp for top riders at the 500-foot-long superpipe at Buttermilk Mountain near Aspen.
snippet: U.S. Snowboarding made a deal to hold an exclusive two-week camp for top riders at the 500-foot-long superpipe at Buttermilk Mountain near Aspen.
